Our team

It takes a team to move a mountain

Our team thrives on the diverse and unique blend of expertise from a range of professionals - otologists, audiologists, hospital administrators, university researchers, and engineers. United by a common goal, we are committed to developing a non-invasive diagnostic tool for clinical otology. We focus on exploring optical coherence tomography (OCT) to image the middle ear for improved conductive hearing diagnostics. Dedicated to bringing this innovative technology from the research lab to clinical settings, we aim to provide clinicians with complementary insights to existing clinical tools in their daily practice and improve the outcomes for patients.
